cards.name: Mistakes of the Past
cards.description:
Ethereal. TheBrainlets:Afterlife.
Gain 7 (10) Block.
When Exhausted,
gain 1 TheBrainlets:Blur.

cards.name: Choose Your Start
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) Plated Armor.
Gain 3 (4) TheBrainlets:Infection.

cards.name: Defend
cards.description: Gain 5 (8) Block.

cards.name: Mark The Path
cards.description:
Deal 14 damage.
Place a card from your hand into TheBrainlets:Stasis.
TheBrainlets:Dead_On: Shuffle 2 Voids into your draw pile.

cards.name: Strike
cards.description: Deal 6 (9) damage.

cards.name: Beer From Nowhere
cards.description:
Drink a random common potion.
Add a Wound to your draw pile.
TheBrainlets:Dead_On: Add 2 more.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Data Recovery
cards.description:
Gain 6 (9) Block.
Place a card from your discard pile into TheBrainlets:Stasis.

cards.name: Desperate Assault
cards.description:
Deal 9 (11) damage.
Apply 9 (11) TheBrainlets:Soulburn.
Exhaust 2 ~~- random  -~~ cards in your hand.

cards.name: Detailed Essay
cards.description:
Gain 7 (10) Block.
The next 2 Attacks you play this turn draw a card.

cards.name: Footshot
cards.description:
Deal 12 (16) damage.
TheBrainlets:Dead_On: Deal half damage.

cards.name: Fortifying Strike
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage.
Gain 1 (2) Plated Armor.

cards.name: Ghostly Mittens
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 7 (9) Block.
When Exhausted, apply 1 (2) Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Infected Shield
cards.description:
Gain 7 (11) Block.
Gain 3 (4) TheBrainlets:Infection.

cards.name: Infected Strike
cards.description:
Deal 11 (15) damage.
Gain 2 TheBrainlets:Infection.

cards.name: Memento's Blade
cards.description:
Deal 8 (12) damage to ALL enemies.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable to EVERYONE.

cards.name: Minor Beams
cards.description:
Deal 5 (7) damage.
Add a (an)  (Upgraded) 1 cost copy of this card to your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

cards.name: Morale Booster
cards.description:
Deal 7 (8) damage.
Gain 2 (3) temporary Strength.

cards.name: Opening Wrath
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage.
Add 2 (3) to the damaged enemy's Weak and Vulnerable.

cards.name: Planned Out
cards.description:
Draw 1 (2) card (cards).
Place the top 2 cards of your draw pile into TheBrainlets:Stasis.

cards.name: Prestidigitation
cards.description:
Gain 12 (16) Block.
Apply 2 Weak to EVERYONE.

cards.name: Probing Jab
cards.description:
Deal 14 (18) damage.
Gain 3 (4) temporary Dexterity.

cards.name: Relentless Lash
cards.description:
Deal 4 (6) damage 2 times.
Place this card into TheBrainlets:Stasis.
TheBrainlets:Stasis lasts 2 turns.

cards.name: Speedy Plating
cards.description:
Gain 2 Plated Armor.
TheBrainlets:Accelerate (twice).

cards.name: Suspending Slam
cards.description:
Deal 8 (11) damage.
Place a card in your hand into TheBrainlets:Stasis.

cards.name: Wash
cards.description:
Gain 11 Block.
Reduce each of your debuffs by 1 (2).

cards.name: Whirring In Thought
cards.description:
Draw 5 cards.
Discard 4 (3) cards.

cards.name: Amalgamation
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) temporary Dexterity.
Retain up to 2 (3) cards this turn.

cards.name: Blessing of Heritage
cards.description: Gain 3 temporary Strength, Dexterity, and Thorns. (Reduce each of your debuffs by 1.)

cards.name: Boss Hatred
cards.description:
Deal 13 damage.
Apply 1 (2) Vulnerable.
Apply 1 (2) Weak.
If the enemy has negative Focus, gain [E] [E].

cards.name: Braking Blast
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage.
Gain Block equal to unblocked damage dealt.
TheBrainlets:Decelerate.

cards.name: Bronze Reinforcement
cards.description:
* (Innate.)
Plated Armor cannot be reduced by more than 3 per turn from enemy attacks.

cards.name: Charging Power
cards.description:
Place this card into TheBrainlets:Stasis.
TheBrainlets:Tick - Gain 6 Block and 1 Strength.
When this card would leave TheBrainlets:Stasis, Exhaust it.

cards.name: Cocktail Flare
cards.description:
Deal 30 damage.
Exhaust up to 1 (2) card (cards).
Gain 2 Frail.

cards.name: Drunken Darts
cards.description:
Deal 10 (14) damage to a random enemy.
TheBrainlets:Dead_On: This card hits you instead.

cards.name: Exclusion Zone
cards.description:
EVERYONE gains 16 (20) Block.
TheBrainlets:Dead_On: Lose 16 (20) Block.

cards.name: Infectious Cascade
cards.description:
Apply 3 (5) Vulnerable and 8 (10) TheBrainlets:Infection to ALL enemies.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Leaping Slam
cards.description:
Deal 6 (8) damage and apply 2 (3) TheBrainlets:Infection to ALL enemies.
If you have TheBrainlets:Infection, repeat these effects once.

cards.name: Loss Of Composure
cards.description:
Remove ALL Block from EVERYONE.
Deal 12 (16) damage.

cards.name: Magic Bullets
cards.description:
Deal 3 (4) damage 3 times.
Add 2  (Upgraded) copies of this card into your hand.

cards.name: Memory Sifting
cards.description:
(Innate.)
At the start of each turn, TheBrainlets:Accelerate.

cards.name: Next Build Fix
cards.description:
Gain 4 (6) temporary Strength.
Exhaust a card.
Next turn, gain a copy of the Exhausted card.

cards.name: Nicorette Barrel
cards.description:
Whenever you play a card with TheBrainlets:Dead_On, apply 4 (6) TheBrainlets:Soulburn to ALL enemies.
Whenever you trigger a TheBrainlets:Dead_On effect, gain 4 (6) TheBrainlets:Soulburn.

cards.name: Parrying Flail
cards.description:
Deal 6 damage 3 (4) times.
Gain 6 temporary Thorns.

cards.name: Power Surge
cards.description:
Draw 4 cards.
Next turn, draw 2 less cards. (Reduce each of your debuffs by 1.)

cards.name: Pushback
cards.description:
Gain 8 (11) Block.
TheBrainlets:Tick - Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Smash and Save
cards.description:
Deal 24 (32) damage.
TheBrainlets:Accelerate ALL cards in TheBrainlets:Stasis.

cards.name: Suspending Disbelief
cards.description:
Gain 5 (8) Block.
If your TheBrainlets:Stasis slots are full, gain [E] and draw 1 card.

cards.name: Tempering Protocol
cards.description: Whenever you lose a buff, gain 3 (4) Block.

cards.name: Thorny Nettles
cards.description:
Gain 9 (12) Block.
TheBrainlets:Dead_On: EVERYONE gains 2 (3) Thorns.

cards.name: Tick-Down Defenses
cards.description:
Gain 3 (5) Plated Armor. TheBrainlets:Tick - Gain 1 Plated Armor.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Tough Cleanse
cards.description:
Gain 5 Block.
Reduce each of your debuffs by 2.
~~- Exhaust. -~~

cards.name: Virtuous Repentance
cards.description:
Retain.
Reduce each of your debuffs by 1 (2).

cards.name: Warding Sigil
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever you gain Weak or Vulnerable, inflict it to ALL enemies.

cards.name: Wild Beams
cards.description:
Deal 8 (10) damage to a random enemy.
Repeat per card in TheBrainlets:Stasis.

cards.name: Working To Float
cards.description:
Gain 3 (4) Plated Armor.
When Exhausted, add a (an)  (Upgraded) 0 cost copy of this card to your hand.

cards.name: Beyond The Pain
cards.description: For each card in your Exhaust pile, a random enemy loses 5 (7) HP.

cards.name: Compression
cards.description:
Spend ALL your Block to gain half (that) ~~- as  -~~ much Plated Armor.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Desperate Prayer
cards.description:
Copy your hand.
Deal damage equal to 2 (3) times the number of cards copied.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Developer Form
cards.description:
~~- Ethereal. -~~
At the start of each turn, discard any number of cards and draw that many.

cards.name: Dimensional Storage
cards.description: Gain 2 (3) TheBrainlets:Stasis slots.

cards.name: Dubious (Cleaning) Construct
cards.description:
Gain 1 Artifact.
At the start of your turn, if you have no Artifact, gain 1 Artifact.

cards.name: Entrenchment
cards.description: Whenever a card TheBrainlets:Ticks in TheBrainlets:Stasis, gain 1 Plated Armor.

cards.name: Ghostly Formality
cards.description:
Ethereal.
Gain 2 (3) Intangible.
While you are Intangible, at the start of each turn, lose [E].

cards.name: Hot Takes
cards.description:
Apply 50 (69) TheBrainlets:Soulburn to ALL enemies.
TheBrainlets:Dead_On: Add 2 Burns to your hand.

cards.name: Infection Spreading
cards.description: Deal 8 (10) damage and apply 4 (6) TheBrainlets:Infection, increased by your own TheBrainlets:Infection.

cards.name: Leeching Speed
cards.description:
Deal 9 (12) damage.
TheBrainlets:Accelerate once per 5 unblocked damage dealt by this card.

cards.name: Nob Jumpscare
cards.description:
Deal 18 (26) damage.
If you are Vulnerable, attack twice.

cards.name: Pass It Around
cards.description:
Fleeting.
At the end of combat, gain a random TheBrainlets:Pickup relic.

cards.name: Race To The Bottom
cards.description:
Deal 48 (69) damage.
Gain 2 Vulnerable, Weak, and Frail.

cards.name: Rage Escalating
cards.description:
(Innate.)
Whenever a debuff is applied to you, gain 1 Strength.
cards.flavor: Right on the road to your sadness...

cards.name: Rolling Slam
cards.description: Deal damage to ALL enemies equal to 3 (5) times your Plated Armor. Lose ALL (half) your Plated Armor.

cards.name: Seeping Infection
cards.description: If you have TheBrainlets:Infection, add 2  (Upgraded) Mistakes of the Past to your hand.

cards.name: Siphoned Surge
cards.description:
Gain [E] [E].
Draw 3 cards.
TheBrainlets:Decelerate~~-  ALL cards in TheBrainlets:Stasis -~~ .
Exhaust.

cards.name: Slashnado
cards.description:
Deal 9 (8) damage 4 (5) times to ALL enemies.
Skip your next turn.

cards.name: Survival Instincts
cards.description:
Gain 11 (13) Block X times.
Gain X Weak, Frail, and TheBrainlets:Infection.

cards.name: Upload Trouble
cards.description:
(Innate.)
The first card played each turn refunds its cost and is Exhausted.

relics.name: Ping For Run
relics.description: At the start of combat, add a random Attack and Skill from your draw pile to your hand.
relics.flavorText: A simple and effective way to signal the beginning of a run.

relics.name: Infected Balloon
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 2 Temporary Strength and 2 Temporary Dexterity.

relics.name: Pyro Chamber
relics.description:
At the start of combat, gain 1 Stasis slot.
Whenever a card leaves Stasis, apply 4 Soulburn to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Flywheel
relics.description: At the start of each turn, Accelerate.

relics.name: Carbon's Skillbook
relics.description:
ALL cards cost 1, except for X cost and Unplayable cards.
Future card rewards have 2 additional cards to choose from.
Upon pickup, if you do not have one already, obtain a Prismatic Shard.
relics.flavorText: Filled with pages upon pages of nonsense strings of text.

relics.name: Great Spire Collab Run
relics.description:
Replaces Ping for Run.
At the start of each turn, draw 2 cards and discard 1 card.
relics.flavorText: Too many cooks do not spoil the broth, or perhaps 10 isn't too many.

relics.name: The White Moth's Embrace
relics.description: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. Your Infection doesn't decrease at the end of your turn.
relics.flavorText: The Radiance only ever wanted to be loved...

relics.name: Stolen Spyglass
relics.description: The first time each turn you trigger a Dead On effect, gain [E]
relics.flavorText: Stolen as it was stolen before.

potions.name: Tame Potion
potions.description: Gain 18 Block. Gain 2 Weak, Frail, and Infection.

potions.name: Bottle Of Soap
potions.description: Reduce each of your debuffs by 1.

keywords.name: Accelerate
keywords.description: Reduce the turn counter of the right-most card in Stasis by 1.

keywords.name: Afterlife
keywords.description: If this card is Exhausted, its effects activate.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Spaces should not be used be avoided in NAMES, with the exception of multi-word keywords (see next entry).

keywords.name: Blur
keywords.description: Block is not removed at the start of your turn.

keywords.name: Dead On
keywords.description: Dead On cards have a bonus effect when in the middle of your hand.

keywords.name: Decelerate
keywords.description: Increase the turn counter of the right-most card in Stasis by 1.

keywords.name: Infection
keywords.description: Infected creatures take damage at the end of their turn. Each turn, Infection is reduced by 2.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in NAMES has no underscores. The rest should use _ in the place of spaces. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: Pickup
keywords.description: A relic selected randomly between Pear, Whetstone, War Paint, Potion Belt, and Lee's Waffle. There is a very small possibility of Tiny House.

keywords.name: Soulburn
keywords.description: After 3 turns, a Soulburned enemy loses HP, removing the Soulburn effect.

keywords.name: Stasis
keywords.description:
A card in Stasis stays there for amount of turns equal to its cost plus 1.
When it exits, it is returned to your hand and costs 0 until played.

keywords.name: Tick
keywords.description: When this card's Stasis turn counter is reduced...

mods.name: The Brainlets
mods.description: Adds The Brainlets, a new playable character.
